name: The Depths (itch) (Hydrogen-8)
description:
It is said that those who seek the treasures of Atlantis, must first brave the terrors of the depths, and attain the riches of the sea.

The Depths is a PICO-8 game made for Ludum Dare 48, 'Deeper and Deeper'. It was our first game jam!

Collect 10 pearls before you can discover Atlantis. Move with the arrow keys, jump with X, and continue through menus with C.
